mapper.select: SELECT Q.QNO, Q.QWRITER, Q.QTITLE, Q.QCONTENT, Q.QDATE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QCOMMENT QC WHERE QC.QNO = Q.QNO) QCCHECK FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON Q.QWRITER = M.USERID WHERE Q.QWRITER =#{userId} ORDER BY Q.QDATE DESC
SELECT QC.*, M.PHOTO FROM QCOMMENT QC JOIN MEMBER M ON M.USERID = QC.QWRITER WHERE QC.QNO = #{qno} ORDER BY QCDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QCOMMENT VALUES(SEQ_QCNO.NEXTVAL, #{qno}, #{qWriter}, #{qcContent}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYY/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss.ff2'), #{ref_qcno}, #{qcLevel})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QCOMMENT WHERE QNO =#{qno} AND QCNO = (SELECT MAX(QCNO) FROM QCOMMENT WHERE QNO =#{qno})

SELECT A.*, NVL(A.MONTH,0) AS AM, P.* , NVL(P.MONTH,0)AS PM FROM (SELECT PTYPE AS P, SUBSTR(PDATE,6,2)MONTH, COUNT(*)PC FROM PRODUCT WHERE PTYPE =1 GROUP BY PTYPE ,SUBSTR(PDATE,6,2) ORDER BY MONTH ASC)P FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT PTYPE AS A, SUBSTR(PDATE,6,2)MONTH, COUNT(*)AC FROM PRODUCT WHERE PTYPE =2 GROUP BY PTYPE ,SUBSTR(PDATE,6,2) ORDER BY MONTH ASC)A ON A.MONTH = P.MONTH ORDER BY (CASE WHEN AM > PM THEN PM ELSE AM END)
SELECT QNO, QWRITER FROM QCOMMENT ORDER BY QCDATE DESC
